content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace array at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0) - Currently has 0 iron ore and 0 coal.
- Furnace at position (2.0, 0.0) - Currently has 0 iron ore and 0 coal.
- Furnace at position (4.0, 0.0) - Currently has 0 iron ore and 0 coal.
- Furnace at position (6.0, 0.0) - Currently has 2 iron ore and 0 coal.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to missing coal in furnaces
- Ensure you have enough coal in your inventory to insert into the furnaces. Currently, all furnaces are missing coal to smelt despite having iron ore.

### Errors when trying to insert into furnaces
- If you receive messages about not having enough coal to insert into the furnaces, check your inventory and gather more coal before attempting to insert it again.
